articles.description: The company’s busy season brought new phones, watches and earbuds—plus a free iPhone makeover for existing owners. Our reviewers tested it all.
articles.content:
Every fall, Apple unveils many new devices, software and services. Some of the offerings are incremental updates to what came before, but others break new ground. 
After the companys marketing glitt… [+233 chars]
